caption.p: Lactoperoxidase cycle [from Bafort et al., 2014), modified]: SCN −, thiocyanate; I −, iodide; H2O2, hydrogen peroxide; LPO, lactoperoxidase; OSCN −, hypothiocyanite; OI − hypoiodite; R–SH, peptide or protein with a thiol moiety; R-S-SCN or R-S-I, sulfenyl thiocyanate or sulfenyl iodide; and R–SOH, sulfenic acid.
